chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (g : A -> B -> Prop) (P : Prop), (forall (a : A) (b : B), Marker.group (g a b) -> P) -> Marker.end_defer (exists (a : A) (b : B), g a b) -> P

Premises:
Module Marker := Struct Definition end_defer : Type -> Type. Definition group : Prop -> Prop. Parameter group_fold : forall P : Prop, P -> group P. End 
Marker.group = fun P : Prop => P : Prop -> Prop Arguments Marker.group _%type_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF
Marker.end_defer = fun P : Type => P : Type -> Type Arguments Marker.end_defer _%type_scope
Unnamed_thm0 : forall (A : Type) (g : A -> Prop) (P : Prop), (forall a : A, Marker.group (g a) -> P) -> Marker.end_defer (exists a : A, g a) -> P
Unnamed_thm : forall (g : Prop) (P : Type), (Marker.group g -> P) -> Marker.end_defer g -> P
VectorDef.Exists_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> SProp), (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> (forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> P0 m v -> P0 (S m) (VectorDef.cons A x m v)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.Exists P t -> P0 n t
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons A x m v) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons A x m v) Arguments VectorDef.Exists {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists_cons_hd {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists_cons_tl {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope
Decidable.dec_imp : forall A B : Prop, Decidable.decidable A -> Decidable.decidable B -> Decidable.decidable (A -> B)
List.rev_unit : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A), List.rev (l ++ a :: nil) = (a :: List.rev l)%list
Inductive clos_trans_1n (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := t1n_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x y | t1n_trans : forall y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x z Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.t1n_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.t1n_trans _%type_scope

ssrbool.and4_rect : forall (P1 P2 P3 P4 : Prop) (P : Type), (P1 -> P2 -> P3 -> P4 -> P) -> ssrbool.and4 P1 P2 P3 P4 -> P
ssrbool.prop_on2 : forall T1 T2 T3 : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T2 -> forall (f : T1 -> T2) (Pf : (T1 -> T2) -> T3) (P : T1 -> T1 -> Prop), ssreflect.phantom T3 (Pf f) -> ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x y : T1, P x y) -> Prop
PeanoNat.Nat.log2_up_eq_succ_iff_pow2 : forall a : nat, 0 < a -> PeanoNat.Nat.log2_up (S a) = S (PeanoNat.Nat.log2_up a) < -> (exists b : nat, a = PeanoNat.Nat.pow 2 b)
BinInt.Z.rem_bound_pos : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 a -> BinInt.Z.lt BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 (BinInt.Z.rem a b) /\ BinInt.Z.lt (BinInt.Z.rem a b) b

BinNat.N.div_mod : forall a b : BinNums.N, b <> BinNums.N0 -> a = BinNat.N.add (BinNat.N.mul b (BinNat.N.div a b)) (BinNat.N.modulo a b)

BinIntDef.Z.rem = fun a b : BinNums.Z => snd (BinIntDef.Z.quotrem a b) : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.rem (_ _)%Z_scope
BinNatDef.N.modulo = fun a b : BinNums.N => snd (BinNatDef.N.div_eucl a b) : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.modulo (_ _)%N_scope

ssrbool.on2W : forall (T1 T2 : ssrbool.predArgType) (D2 : ssrbool.pred_sort (ssrbool.predPredType T2)) (f : T1 -> T2) (Q2 : (T1 -> T2) -> T1 -> T1 -> Prop), (forall x y : T1, Q2 f x y) -> ssrbool.prop_on2 (ssrbool.mem D2) (f:=f) (Pf:=fun f'' : T1 -> T2 => forall x y : T1, Q2 f'' x y) (P:= Q2 f) (ssrbool.inPhantom (forall x y : T1, Q2 f x y)) (ssrbool.inPhantom (forall x y : T1, Q2 f x y))

Ring_polynom.mkmult_c_pos_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> forall (c : C) (lm : list (R * BinNums.positive)), req (Ring_polynom.mkmult_c_pos rI cI ceqb phi mkpow mkmult_pow c lm) (rmul (phi c) (Ring_polynom.r_list_pow rI rmul lm))
Ring_polynom.ropp_ext_Proper : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req req) ropp
Ring_polynom.radd_ext_Proper : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) radd
Ring_polynom.rmul_ext_Proper : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) rmul
Ring_polynom.mkadd_mult_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> forall (rP : R) (c : C) (lm : list (R * BinNums.positive)), req (Ring_polynom.mkadd_mult rI radd rsub cI ceqb phi get_sign mkpow mkmult_pow rP c lm) (radd rP (rmul (phi c) (Ring_polynom.r_list_pow rI rmul lm)))
Ring_theory.morph_opp : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> forall x : C, req (phi (copp x)) (ropp (phi x))
BinNat.N.eqf = fun f g : BinNums.N -> bool => forall n : BinNums.N, f n = g n : (BinNums.N -> bool) -> (BinNums.N -> bool) -> Prop Arguments BinNat.N.eqf (_ _)%function_scope
Ring_theory.ARsub_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rsub x y) (radd x (ropp y))
Ring_theory.morph_eq : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> forall x y : C, ceqb x y = true -> req (phi x) (phi y)
Ring_theory.ARopp_mul_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (rmul x y)) (rmul (ropp x) y)
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n)
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop

```coq
intros A B g P H1 H2.
intros H3 [a [b H4]].
apply (H1 a b).
apply H2.
exists a, b.
exact H4.
Qed.```

original: intros A B g P H1 H2. intros H3 [a [b H4]]. apply (H1 a b). apply H2. exists a, b. apply H4.
